landing.bio: I am a software engineer with a passion for coding. My tech stack includes Java and Javascript but I love learning new skills and programming languages. In my current work, I mostly use Java Spring but for personal projects, I try other technologies like node.js and express.js. I believe blockchain will change how things work on the internet right now so I decided to learn more about how it works and I got a Blockchain Developer nanodegree from Udacity. I mostly know backend technologies but I always check what new things for frontend are out and I try them on personal projects.

experience.aboutWork: Working with one of the largest telecom companies in Greece, by making analysis,development,estimation and planning for new projects and providing support. Projects I have been working on or i still work : • Setting up Microservices in Kubernetes cluster( CI-CD, JenkinsX, Docker, Helm).• Payment Gateway ( Spring boot,Zuul LB, RabbitMQ,Eureka) and Recurring payments • Mobile app backend (backend migration in Java Spring,Project Reactor, Redis, WIldfly application server configuration set up with cluster, still supporting and making change requests) • Mobile application backend for technicians ( Java Spring, consuming web services (wsdl) and push notifications with Rest technologies) • E-bill portal for fixed users • Portal for Mobile users (WebLogic portal)
•Backend and Frontend Developer (php, html, java,sql) •Debugging •Forum Creation (http://forum.insurancemarket.gr) •Blog administration ( Joomla)

education.university: Athens University of Economics and Business
Athens University of Economics and Business
Coding Bootcamp - Alliance For Digital Employability (HePIS, CEPIS, AUEB)

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a software developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. I like playing football.
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors, I watch  movies and television shows and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the backend and frontend web development world.
